name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - D | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I will give you three definitions.  The first word will be a word that begins with a D, the second will be a word after dropping a D, and the last will have one more dropped letter.  To answer the question, type the longest of the three words.  For instance, if the clue read "Tasteless - Nation - Also," the answer would be "bland," because bland - land - and.

Rough copy - Floating vessel - Toward the back of a boat
Small drink - Male sheep - I _, you are
Device used for making holes - Small stream - Sick
Oil container or band instrument - Alcoholic drink - Word whisker
Long curtain - Sexually assault - Monkey or copy
Small drop of water - Tear - Type of address
